attributes.action: To pay every NHS and Social Care Worker in England a £500 "Thank You" Bonus
attributes.additional_details: In recognition of our NHS heath and social care workers during the pandemic for their extraordinary service during the pandemic.
attributes.background: To pay by way of a "Thank You" bonus a £500 one off bonus to our NHS and Social Care workers in England in recognition for their extraordinary service during the pandemic.

departments.name: Department of Health and Social Care
